sources.name: sourceBatting
sources.script:
source(output(
		playerID as string,
		yearID as string,
		stint as string,
		teamID as string,
		lgID as string,
		G as integer,
		AB as integer,
		R as integer,
		H as integer,
		H2B as integer,
		H3B as integer,
		HR as integer,
		RBI as integer,
		SB as integer,
		CS as integer,
		BB as integer,
		SO as integer,
		IBB as integer,
		HBP as integer,
		SH as integer,
		SF as integer,
		GIDP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceBatting

sources.name: sourcePlayer
sources.script:
source(output(
		playerID as string,
		birthYear as string,
		birthMonth as string,
		birthDay as string,
		birthCountry as string,
		birthState as string,
		birthCity as string,
		deathYear as string,
		deathMonth as string,
		deathDay as string,
		deathCountry as string,
		deathState as string,
		deathCity as string,
		nameFirst as string,
		nameLast as string,
		nameGiven as string,
		weight as string,
		height as string,
		bats as string,
		throws as string,
		debut as string,
		finalGame as string,
		retroID as string,
		bbrefID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourcePlayer

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
addTimestamp sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> sink1

transformations.name: origSourceBatting
transformations.script:
sourceBatting select(mapColumn(
		playerID,
		yearID,
		stint,
		teamID,
		lgID,
		G,
		AB,
		R,
		H,
		H2B,
		H3B,
		HR,
		RBI,
		SB,
		CS,
		BB,
		SO,
		IBB,
		HBP,
		SH,
		SF,
		GIDP
	))~> origSourceBatting

transformations.name: createAggs
transformations.script:
sourceBatting aggregate(groupBy(playerID_yearID = playerID+'_'+yearID),
	BA = round(avg(H/AB),3),
		OBP = round(avg((H+BB+HBP)/(AB+BB+HBP+SF)),3),
		SLG = round(avg(((HR * 4) + (H3B * 3) + (H2B * 2) + (H-H2B-H3B-HR))/AB),3),
		TB = max((HR * 4) + (H3B * 3) + (H2B * 2) + (H-H2B-H3B-HR))) ~> createAggs

transformations.name: PlayerInfoPlusOrigStats
transformations.script:
sourcePlayer, origSourceBatting join(sourcePlayer@playerID == origSourceBatting@playerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> PlayerInfoPlusOrigStats

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.script:
createAggs, origSourceBatting join(playerID_yearID == playerID + '_'+yearID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
